page.title: 06HOUSING IN EAST COKER
page.content:
East Coker is a very popular village because of its proximity to Yeovil and the{character}of its buildings.Most of the houses are old,built of local {Hamstone with thatched or slate roofs. Many have been{converted}from a former use,for example Forge Cottage.
{ House prices}are around the average for the country;a new semi-detached house would cost Â£35000 and an older property from Â£50000 depending on its age,position and character.
There are{two estates}of newer housing at Mill Lane and Broadacres, but not much new building is being done at present.
